snippet: HCA, a for-profit hospital chain, said the inquiry centered on “medical necessity” of cardiology services at 10 of its hospitals, primarily in Florida.

byline.original: By JULIE CRESWELL and REED ABELSON

lead_paragraph: HCA, a for-profit hospital chain, said the inquiry centered on “medical necessity” of cardiology services at 10 of its hospitals, primarily in Florida.

headline.seo: HCA Discloses U.S. Inquiry Into Cardiology Services
headline.main: HCA Discloses U.S. Inquiry Into Cardiology Services
headline.print_headline: HCA Discloses U.S. Inquiry Into Cardiology Services
